name: Blundstone Winter Thermal 584 Boots - Unisex
description: A winter version of a classic, much-loved Blundstone Boot. The uppers have Thinsulate insulation to wrap your feet in warmth, and the footbed adds a sheepskin insole to wick moisture and put a layer of soft warmth between you and the icy sidewalk.Uppers are waterproof nubuck leather, seamlessly fused to the soles for resilient construction.Waterproof elastic on the sides and waterproof taped seams.Thinsulate insulation retains warmth if wet and dries fast.Insoles are sheepskin wool that helps wick moisture away from your foot keeping them dry and thus warm.Pull loops for extra leverage.Outsoles are slip-resistant rubber to keep you on course.Round toe, medium width.These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size.
